thread.title: Atletico Madrid open to offers for Kevin Gameiro this summer - potentially solving Tottenham's strike problem
thread.title_full: Atletico Madrid open to offers for Kevin Gameiro this summer - potentially solving Tottenham's strike problem - Mirror Online

author: mirror.co.uk
title: Atletico Madrid open to offers for Kevin Gameiro this summer - potentially solving Tottenham's strike problem

organizations.name: atlético madrid la liga tottenham hotspur fc tottenham

text:
Atletico Madrid open to offers for Kevin Gameiro this summer - potentially solving Tottenham's strike problem Gameiro had been a key player in Sevilla's trio of Europa League successes under Unai Emery before joining Atleti Share Comments By John Cross 22:30, 19 FEB 2017 Sport Gameiro is proven in both Spain and Europe (Photo: Getty Images) football Atletico Madrid are ready to listen to offers for France striker Kevin Gameiro - and that could appeal to Tottenham.
Gameiro, 29, joined Atletico for £35million last summer but he has not been a huge success and the Spanish club could be ready to sell.
They have sounded out several clubs, including Tottenham who want top class competition back up and competition for Harry Kane.
Gameiro had been a key player in Sevilla's trio of Europa League successes under Unai Emery.
Gameiro fired a hat-trick at the weekend (Photo: REUTERS) But he has failed to have the desired impact for Diego Simeone's side, despite scoring the fastest hat-trick in La Liga in 22 years this past weekend.
His treble after coming off the bench took him to 11 goals in 33 games for Atleti this term.
But he has not been a guaranteed first-choice alongside Antoine Griezmann.
